snippet.title: Grammy Nominations 2014: The Full List
snippet.description: The nominations have been announced for the 56th Annual Grammy Awards, with Jay Z's nine nods leading the pack. Four acts garnered seven nominations apiece: Kendrick Lamar, Pharrell Williams, Justin Timberlake and Macklemore & Ryan Lewis. But there are plenty more superstars--and lesser-known but stupendously talented musicians--among the [...]

snippet.title: SAP​Voice: Memo to Salesforce.com CEO Marc Benioff: You Stand on Software's Shoulders
Meet The World's Greatest George Washington Impersonator
snippet.description: More than 200 years after his death, George Washington is still the most popular man in the room. “Washington is received almost universally with acclamation and roaring applause,” Dean Malissa says. “My friends who portray Thomas Jefferson walk around with a target on their back. People are just ripe for all kinds [...] read »
